fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Every night, visit another player to see if they own a minecraft game, which as follows.
Unowned:Unstoppable
MC Dungeons:Powerful
Bedrock Edition(Win 10/Mobile/Xbox One/PS4/Xbox Series/PS5/Switch):Basic
Legacy Edition (Xbox 360/PS3/Xbox One/PS4/Wii U/3DS):Basic
Java Edition:None

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Prior to the start of the game, the owner of the role must prove they own either version of the 2011 video game "Minecraft" (Java or bedrock edition), if not, this role will be rerolled.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure everyone alive has a minecraft game
